Content:: Raymond Martin (born 22 May 1949) is a former French road bicycle racer. In the 1980 Tour de France he finished third overall and won the mountains classification. He also competed in the individual road race at the 1972 Summer Olympics.[1]  This biographical article related to a French cycling person born in the 1940s is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
